title: (x) Oakenfold Techno/Retro Script? - Rocket {BJ, Tiff}
content:
Ok, I have seen this one before. But at my last job. No clue about the name or where to obatin (though I'd assume myfonts would have it)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/11195.jpg)   
Please, could anyone help a brotha out?
author: kojo

comments.content:
http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font\_frames.tpl?cart=10540714379744589&fontname=Rocket   
   
(oops found a bug in their system =D)
Hey there BJ! Do I get points for proper capitalization? =D

![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
\>\> Do I get points for proper capitalization?   
i'm still lurning that stuff. What I (WE)   
REALLY need to learn is how to LINK   
stuff as efficiently as Yves and Stephen.   
   
Here, here and here.   
1 2 3 4 5   
   
That's a good June 1 resolution.   
   
So "clean linking"

But .... BJ that is the only way I can even come close to beating anyone on a post. I'm not so fast at the [URL](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/board-formatting.html) type stuff. ;)

Hi there BJ: the code for a link in a new browser page is   
\newurl{ [http://www.whatever.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711/http:/www.whatever.com/), text description}.   
   
Check Tiff's [URL](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/board-formatting.html) link in her previous post: the chapter   
 [Other Formatting: Hyperlinks](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018172711/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/board-formatting.html#links) contains all the information   
you need.

Tiff, I know what you mean. I used to 'cheat' all   
the time in order to get first IDs (geez, now I sound   
like a conceited old fart...)

BTW BJ the fastest way to do it is to copy/paste the   
URL into the code, or to hold down the mouse button   
and select _'Copy link location'_. You probably knew   
that, but I thought I might as well mention it. ;p
